pull_request.title: feat(service): upgrade formbricks to v4
pull_request.body: ### Changes - feat(service): upgrade formbricks to v4 with all the necessary changes ### Issue - fixes https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/issues/8015 ### Category - [x] Fixing or updating existing one click service ### Screenshots or Video (if applicable) https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b8d21ff3-4109-4807-8ec9-f0262631a91d ### AI Usage - [x] AI is NOT used in the process of creating this PR ### Steps to Test - Step 1 – Deploy formbricks using the compose in this PR - Step 2 – wait for 5mins (db migration and startup stuffs) - Step 3 – visit the service url ### Notes > For the initial startup formbricks takes 5 minutes so during this time visiting the url will throw 404. I tried deploying it multiple times and this behavior is consistent all the time. ### Contributor Agreement > [!IMPORTANT] > - [x] I have read and understood the [contributor guidelines](https://github.com/coollabsio/coolify/blob/v4.x/CONTRIBUTING.md). If I have failed to follow any guideline, I understand that this PR may be closed without review. > - [x] I have tested the changes thoroughly and am confident that they will work as expected without issues when the maintainer tests them
